select t.id, t.title, t.ep_rule as epRule, t.start_time as startTime, t.end_time as endTime, t.last_pay_time as lastPayTime, t.is_show as isShow, t.create_date as createDate, t.update_date as updateDate, t.add_user_id as addUserId, t.is_del as isDel, t.note as note from tb_ep_sale t where t.is_del = 0
and t.title like "%"#{param.title}"%"
order by t.id desc

select concat(ep.id,'') id, ep.title, ep.ep_rule as erRule, ep.start_time as startTime, ep.end_time as endTime, case when epImg.file_name is null then '' else concat("get-img","/",epImg.file_group,"/",epImg.ref_id,"/",epImg.file_name) end as epImg, case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())<0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())>=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.end_time, now())<=0 then 2 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.end_time, now())>0 then 3 else 0 end as erSatus from tb_ep_sale ep left join tb_file_info epImg on epImg.ref_id=ep.id where ep.is_del=0

select concat(ep.id,'') id, ep.title, ep.ep_rule as erRule, ep.start_time as startTime, epSaleEndTime.endTime, case when epImg.file_name is null then '' else concat("get-img","/",epImg.file_group,"/",epImg.ref_id,"/",epImg.file_name) end as epImg, case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())<0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())>=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,epSaleEndTime.endTime, now())<=0 then 2 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,epSaleEndTime.endTime, now())>0 then 3 else 0 end as erSatus from tb_ep_sale ep left join tb_file_info epImg on epImg.ref_id=ep.id left join ( select max(epSaleNum.end_time) as endTime,epSaleNum.g_active as epSaleId from ( select num.end_time,goods.g_active from tb_num num inner join tb_sku sku on num.sku_id=sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods goods on goods.g_id=sku.g_id) epSaleNum group by epSaleNum.g_active ) as epSaleEndTime on epSaleEndTime.epSaleId=ep.id where ep.is_del=0 and ep.id in( select tb_goods.g_active from tb_num inner join tb_sku on tb_num.sku_id=tb_sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_id=tb_sku.g_id left join tb_file_info on tb_file_info.ref_id=tb_goods.g_id where tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1) order by case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())>=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,epSaleEndTime.endTime, now())<=0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())<0 then 2 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,epSaleEndTime.endTime, now())>0 then 3 else 0 end,ep.id

select concat(ep.id,'') id, ep.title, ep.ep_rule as erRule, ep.start_time as startTime, ep.end_time as endTime, case when epImg.file_name is null then '' else concat("get-img","/",epImg.file_group,"/",epImg.ref_id,"/",epImg.file_name) end as epImg, case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())<0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())>=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.end_time, now())<=0 then 2 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.end_time, now())>0 then 3 else 0 end as erSatus from tb_ep_sale ep left join tb_file_info epImg on epImg.ref_id=ep.id where ep.is_del=0 and ep.end_time>now()

select distinct concat(ep.id,'') id, ep.title, ep.ep_rule as erRule, ep.start_time as startTime, epSaleEndTime.endTime, case when epImg.file_name is null then '' else concat("get-img","/",epImg.file_group,"/",epImg.ref_id,"/",epImg.file_name) end as epImg, case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())<0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())>=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,epSaleEndTime.endTime, now())<=0 then 2 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,epSaleEndTime.endTime, now())>0 then 3 else 0 end as erSatus, tb_goods.g_is_pack as erIsPack from tb_ep_sale ep left join tb_file_info epImg on epImg.ref_id=ep.id left join ( select max(epSaleNum.end_time) as endTime,epSaleNum.g_active as epSaleId from ( select num.end_time,goods.g_active from tb_num num inner join tb_sku sku on num.sku_id=sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods goods on goods.g_id=sku.g_id) epSaleNum group by epSaleNum.g_active ) as epSaleEndTime on epSaleEndTime.epSaleId=ep.id left join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_active=ep.id where ep.is_del=0 and tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1 and ep.id in( select tb_goods.g_active from tb_num inner join tb_sku on tb_num.sku_id=tb_sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_id=tb_sku.g_id left join tb_file_info on tb_file_info.ref_id=tb_goods.g_id where tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1) order by case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())>=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,epSaleEndTime.endTime, now())<=0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())<0 then 2 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,epSaleEndTime.endTime, now())>0 then 3 else 0 end,ep.id

select concat(ep.id,'') id, ep.title, ep.ep_rule as erRule, ep.start_time as startTime, epSaleEndTime.endTime, case when epImg.file_name is null then '' else concat("get-img","/",epImg.file_group,"/",epImg.ref_id,"/",epImg.file_name) end as epImg, case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())<0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())>=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,epSaleEndTime.endTime, now())<=0 then 2 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,epSaleEndTime.endTime, now())>0 then 3 else 0 end as erSatus from tb_ep_sale ep inner join tb_file_info epImg on epImg.ref_id=ep.id left join ( select max(epSaleNum.end_time) as endTime,epSaleNum.g_active as epSaleId from ( select num.end_time,goods.g_active from tb_num num inner join tb_sku sku on num.sku_id=sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods goods on goods.g_id=sku.g_id) epSaleNum group by epSaleNum.g_active ) as epSaleEndTime on epSaleEndTime.epSaleId=ep.id where ep.is_del=0 and ep.id = #{epSaleId};

select concat(ep.id,'') id, case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())<0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())>=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.end_time, now())<=0 then 2 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.end_time, now())>0 then 3 else 0 end as erSatus from tb_ep_sale ep where ep.is_del=0 and ep.id = #{epSaleId};

select concat(ep.id,'') id, ep.title, ep.ep_rule as erRule, ep.start_time as startTime, epSaleEndTime.endTime, case when epImg.file_name is null then '' else concat("get-img","/",epImg.file_group,"/",epImg.ref_id,"/",epImg.file_name) end as epImg, case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())<0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())>=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,epSaleEndTime.endTime, now())<=0 then 2 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,epSaleEndTime.endTime, now())>0 then 3 else 0 end as erSatus, tb_goods.g_is_pack as erIsPack from tb_ep_sale ep inner join tb_file_info epImg on epImg.ref_id=ep.id left join ( select max(epSaleNum.end_time) as endTime,epSaleNum.g_active as epSaleId from ( select num.end_time,goods.g_active from tb_num num inner join tb_sku sku on num.sku_id=sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods goods on goods.g_id=sku.g_id) epSaleNum group by epSaleNum.g_active ) as epSaleEndTime on epSaleEndTime.epSaleId=ep.id left join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_active=ep.id where ep.is_del=0 and tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1 and ep.id = #{epSaleId};

select tb_goods.g_active as epSaleId, count(tb_auction.id) as priceCount from tb_auction inner join tb_goods on tb_auction.g_id=tb_goods.g_id where tb_auction.status in(2,4) and tb_goods.g_active= #{epSaleId} group by tb_goods.g_active

select concat(t.id,'')as id, t.title, t.ep_rule as epRule, t.start_time as startTime, t.end_time as endTime, t.last_pay_time as lastPayTime, t.is_show as isShow, t.create_date as createDate, t.update_date as updateDate, t.add_user_id as addUserId, t.is_del as isDel, t.note as note from tb_ep_sale t where t.is_del = 0 and t.id = #{id};
select * from tb_num where status=2 and id = #{id};

select tb_num.* from tb_num inner join tb_sku on tb_num.sku_id=tb_sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_id=tb_sku.g_id where tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1 and tb_num.status=2 and tb_goods.g_id = #{gId}

select concat(tb_num.id,'')as numId, concat(tb_goods.g_active,'')as gEPSaleId, concat(tb_goods.g_id,'')as gId, case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.start_time, now())<0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.start_time, now())>=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.end_time, now())<=0 then 2 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.end_time, now())>0 then 3 else 0 end as gSatus, tb_goods.g_name as gName, tb_goods.g_ad as gAd, tb_sku.sku_tob_price as gStartPrice, case when tb_file_info.file_name is null then '' else concat("get-img","/",tb_file_info.file_group,"s/",tb_file_info.ref_id,"/",tb_file_info.file_name) end as gImg, concat(tb_sku.sku_id,'')as skuId, tb_num.num_resource as num from tb_num inner join tb_sku on tb_num.sku_id=tb_sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_id=tb_sku.g_id left join tb_file_info on tb_file_info.ref_id=tb_goods.g_id where tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1 and tb_file_info.file_group='goodsPic' and tb_file_info.seq=1 and tb_num.status not in (1,8) and tb_goods.g_active= #{ePSaleId}

select concat(tb_num.id,'')as numId from tb_num inner join tb_sku on tb_num.sku_id=tb_sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_id=tb_sku.g_id left join tb_file_info on tb_file_info.ref_id=tb_goods.g_id where tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1 and tb_num.status in (2) and tb_goods.g_active= #{ePSaleId}

select concat('0','') as numId, concat(tb_goods.g_active,'')as gEPSaleId, concat(tb_goods.g_id,'')as gId, case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.start_time, now())<0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.start_time, now())>=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.end_time, now())<=0 then 2 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.end_time, now())>0 then 3 else 0 end as gSatus, tb_goods.g_name as gName, tb_goods.g_ad as gAd, tb_sku.sku_tob_price as gStartPrice, case when tb_file_info.file_name is null then '' else concat("get-img","/",tb_file_info.file_group,"s/",tb_file_info.ref_id,"/",tb_file_info.file_name) end as gImg, concat(0,'') as skuId, concat('','') as num from tb_num inner join tb_sku on tb_num.sku_id=tb_sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_id=tb_sku.g_id left join tb_file_info on tb_file_info.ref_id=tb_goods.g_id where tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1 and tb_file_info.file_group='goodsPic' and tb_file_info.seq=1 and tb_num.status not in (1,8) and tb_goods.g_active= #{ePSaleId} group by tb_sku.sku_id

select case when tb_file_info.file_name is null then '' else concat("get-img","/",tb_file_info.file_group,"s/",tb_file_info.ref_id,"/",tb_file_info.file_name) end as gImg from tb_num inner join tb_sku on tb_num.sku_id=tb_sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_id=tb_sku.g_id left join tb_file_info on tb_file_info.ref_id=tb_goods.g_id where tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1 and tb_file_info.file_group='goodsPic' and tb_file_info.seq=1 and tb_num.id=#{0} and tb_goods.g_id=#{1}

select concat(goodsInfo.gId,'')as gId, goodsInfo.gName, goodsInfo.gAd, goodsInfo.gSatus, goodsInfo.gStartPrice, numSaleInfo.priceCount, numSaleInfo.currentPrice from ( select tb_num.id as numId, tb_goods.g_active as gEPSaleId, tb_goods.g_id as gId, case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.start_time, now())<0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.start_time, now())>=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.end_time, now())<=0 then 2 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.end_time, now())>0 then 3 else 0 end as gSatus, tb_goods.g_name as gName, tb_goods.g_ad as gAd, tb_sku.sku_tob_price as gStartPrice from tb_num inner join tb_sku on tb_num.sku_id=tb_sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_id=tb_sku.g_id inner join tb_file_info on tb_file_info.ref_id=tb_goods.g_id where tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1 and tb_num.status=2 ) goodsInfo left join (select count(tb_auction.id) as priceCount, max(tb_auction.price) as currentPrice, tb_auction.num_id as numId from tb_auction where tb_auction.status in(2,4) group by tb_auction.num_id) numSaleInfo on numSaleInfo.numId=goodsInfo.numId where goodsInfo.gId = #{goodsId}

select concat(tb_num.id,'')as numId, tb_num.end_time as endTime, tb_goods.g_start_num as startNum, tb_goods.g_deposit as depositPrice from tb_num inner join tb_sku on tb_num.sku_id=tb_sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_id=tb_sku.g_id where tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1 and tb_num.status=2

select concat(tb_num.id,'')as numId, tb_num.end_time as endTime, tb_goods.g_start_num as startNum, tb_goods.g_deposit as depositPrice, tb_num.num_resource as num, concat(tb_goods.g_id,'')as gId from tb_auction inner join tb_num on tb_num.id=tb_auction.num_id inner join tb_sku on tb_sku.sku_id=tb_num.sku_id inner join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_id=tb_sku.g_id where tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1 and tb_num.status=2 and tb_auction.status=2 and tb_num.end_time < now()

mapper.insert:
insert into tb_ep_sale( id, title, ep_rule, start_time, end_time, last_pay_time, is_show, create_date, update_date, add_user_id ) values
( #{EPSale.id}, #{EPSale.title}, #{EPSale.epRule}, #{EPSale.startTime}, #{EPSale.endTime}, #{EPSale.lastPayTime}, #{EPSale.isShow}, #{EPSale.createDate}, #{EPSale.updateDate}, #{EPSale.addUserId} )
mapper.update: update tb_ep_sale t set t.title=#{title}, t.ep_rule=#{epRule} , t.start_time=#{startTime} , t.end_time=#{endTime} , t.last_pay_time=#{lastPayTime} , t.is_show=#{isShow} , t.update_date=#{updateDate} where t.id = #{id}
update tb_ep_sale a set a.is_del =1 where a.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from tb_system s where s.key_id='system_name' for update

select n.id num_id,g.g_id,s.sku_id,n.`status`,n.num_resource,g.g_start_num,g.g_is_pack from tb_num n left join tb_sku s on n.sku_id=s.sku_id left join tb_goods g on g.g_id=s.g_id where n.`status`=2 and g.g_is_auc=1 and g.g_is_sale=1 and g.g_is_pack=0 and n.end_time<=now()

select distinct '0' as num_id,g.g_id, '0' as sku_id,n.`status`,concat('','') as num_resource,g.g_start_num,g.g_is_pack,g.g_name from tb_num n left join tb_sku s on n.sku_id=s.sku_id left join tb_goods g on g.g_id=s.g_id where n.`status`=2 and g.g_is_auc=1 and g.g_is_sale=1 and g.g_is_pack=1 and n.end_time<=now()

and a.consumer_id not in (#{consumer_id})

select * from tb_auction_deposit a where a.num_id=#{num_id} and a.g_id=#{g_id} and a.`status`=2
and a.consumer_id not in (#{consumer_id})

and a.consumer_id not in (#{consumer_id})

select g.g_id,s.sku_id,n.id num_id,n.end_time,TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,now(),n.end_time) `time_status`,g.g_loop_time,(g.g_loop_time) `loop_time` from tb_goods g left join tb_sku s on g.g_id=s.g_id left join tb_num n on n.sku_id=s.sku_id where g.g_is_sale=1 and g.g_is_auc=1 and g.g_id = #{g_id} limit 1
mapper.update: update tb_num n set n.end_time=date_add(n.end_time, interval #{loop_time} minute) where n.id=#{num_id}

update tb_num n inner join tb_sku s on s.sku_id=n.sku_id inner join tb_goods g on g.g_id=s.g_id inner join tb_ep_sale er on er.id=g.g_active set n.end_time=date_add(n.end_time, interval #{loop_time} minute) ,er.end_time=date_add(er.end_time, interval #{loop_time} minute) where g.g_is_pack=1 and g.g_id=#{g_id}
